name: hoarseness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of a person's voice when it sounds rough, often because of a sore throat or a cold: Her symptoms include difficulty breathing and hoarseness. People who talk or sing for a living are especially prone to hoarseness. See
hoarse
More examplesFewer examplesHoarseness is can be brought on by an infection, dry vocal cords, or even coughing too hard.His occasional hoarseness when he sang was a product of touring and age.He spoke with a slight hoarseness in his throat.
